column4: Exclusive: Microsoft has no plans to pursue Salesforce - sources
column5: Microsoft Corp  currently is not weighing an offer for Salesforce.com Inc   two people familiar with the matter said on Thursday  dampening speculation that Microsoft could be drawn into bidding for the cloud software company.

column4: EU antitrust regulators query Qualcomm rivals on its business practices
column5: BRUSSELS EU antitrust regulators are asking Qualcomm's rivals how the U.S. chipmaker's business practices and the way it licenses its products affect them  as part of an investigation begun seven months ago  a document seen by Reuters showed.
